answers.answer: Posting here because you think you have diabetes? What is not posted are the test results of blood draws and a medical examination by a doctor, something you should get as diabetes is one of several reasons for your after meal discomfort. MedHelp has good information on "What is diabetes - Risk factors, Symptoms, and Treatments".http://www.medhelp.org/diabetes; Educate yourself so you can speak first hand with your doctor. Good luck

question: I am 68 male and in good health? But evertime I eat I feel dizzy. I am drinking a lot of water and am hungery all the time. I drank a glass of cranbarry juice and had a bad head rush. I just don't feal right after eating. Can you help me?    Thank you     ***@****
title: Dizzy when eating
